statements: SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_impact_on_poverty;
SELECT poverty_reduction_rate, participants_count FROM education_impact_on_poverty;
SELECT * FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE poverty_reduction_rate > 0.1;
SELECT program_name, participants_count FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, participants_count FROM education_impact_on_poverty ORDER BY participants_count DESC, program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE participants_count > 100 ORDER BY poverty_reduction_rate DESC
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE poverty_reduction_rate > 0.5
SELECT program_name, participants_count FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' AND end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT program_id, program_name, participants_count FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE end_date < '2025-01-01' AND poverty_reduction_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY participants_count DESC
SELECT * FROM education_impact_on_poverty WHERE participants_count = (SELECT MAX(participants_count) FROM education_impact_on_poverty)
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_programs;
SELECT impact_indicator, participants FROM education_programs WHERE participants > 100;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, poverty_reduction_rate FROM education_programs WHERE poverty_reduction_rate > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM education_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, impact_indicator, participants FROM education_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, participants FROM education_programs
SELECT * FROM education_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT program_name, impact_indicator, participants FROM education_programs WHERE poverty_reduction_rate > 0.5
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_result FROM program_evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date
SELECT program_name, participants, impact_indicator FROM education_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM impact_evaluation;
SELECT program_name, impact_score FROM impact_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM program_participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT result_description, result_date FROM program_results WHERE participant_id=1;
SELECT program_name, impact_area, evaluation_date FROM impact_evaluation WHERE impact_score > 0.8 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, impact_score ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM program_participants WHERE participant_age > 25 AND participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM impact_evaluation JOIN program_results ON impact_evaluation.evaluation_id = program_results.evaluation_id GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT * FROM program_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY result_date DESC;

SELECT p.program_name, pr.participant_name, pr.result_description FROM impact_evaluation AS ie JOIN program_participants AS pp ON ie.evaluation_id = pp.program_id JOIN program_results AS pr ON ie.evaluation_id = pr.evaluation_id WHERE ie.impact_area = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT evaluation_score, feedback FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score < 3.5 ORDER BY evaluation_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM poverty_metrics WHERE poverty_rate > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, impact_metric FROM education_programs WHERE impact_metric > 0.5 ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age, program_name FROM participants p JOIN education_programs ep ON p.program_id = ep.program_id WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age ASC, program_name DESC;

SELECT e.evaluation_id, p.participant_name, e.evaluation_score, pm.poverty_level FROM evaluations e JOIN participants p ON e.participant_id = p.participant_id JOIN poverty_metrics pm ON e.evaluation_id = pm.evaluation_id WHERE e.evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY e.evaluation_score DESC, pm.poverty_rate ASC;

SELECT ep.program_name, COUNT(p.participant_id) AS total_participants, AVG(e.evaluation_score) AS avg_score FROM education_programs ep JOIN participants p ON ep.program_id = p.program_id JOIN evaluations e ON p.participant_id = e.participant_id GROUP BY ep.program_name HAVING total_participants > 10 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM education_programs WHERE program_type='Workshop';
SELECT * FROM program_participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type, impact_area FROM education_programs WHERE program_id=1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM program_participants WHERE program_id=2 AND participant_age>20;
SELECT * FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM education_programs WHERE impact_area='Health';
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_id FROM education_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM program_participants WHERE participant_age > 30 AND participant_gender='Male';
SELECT program_name, impact_area FROM education_programs JOIN program_evaluation ON education_programs.program_id = program_evaluation.program_id WHERE impact_rating > 3;
